name: QuickBooks 2010 File
summary: Learn about .QB2010 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Previous Mac QuickBooks versions use the extensions .QB2009, .QB2007, etc. for the year of the software release.

description: Data file created by the Mac version of QuickBooks, a money management application; contains company financial data as well as report definitions and letters; enables companies to store and monitor financial information; can be used for generating payroll, tax forms, and reports.
